ACKDF.summary: Auckland International Airport Limited provides airport facilities, supporting infrastructure, and aeronautical services in Auckland, New Zealand. The company operates through three segments: Aeronautical, Retail, and Property. The Aeronautical segment offers services that facilitate the movement of aircraft, passengers, and cargo, as well as utility services, which support the airport; and leases space for facilities, such as terminals. The Retail segment provides services to the retailers within the terminals; and car parking facilities for passengers, visitors, and airport staff. The Property segment leases cargo buildings, hangars, and stand-alone investment properties. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Manukau, New Zealand.

AGL.NZ.summary: Accordant Group Limited provides recruitment and staffing services in New Zealand. It provides semi-skilled and skilled, primarily temporary staffing services under the AWF brand to construction, infrastructure development, manufacturing, food processing, timber processing, and waste management sectors. The company also offers white collar recruitment services under the Madison brand to clients in central and local government businesses, as well as in health, insurance, telecommunication, banking, and other industries. Further, the company provides executive search, recruitment, and contracting solutions to public, private, and not-for-profit sectors under the JacksonStone brand. Additionally, it operates The Work Collective, which offers organizations to deliver social impact through their staffing supply chain. The company was formerly known as AWF Madison Group Limited and changed its name to Accordant Group Limited in October 2020. Accordant Group Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

AIA.AX.summary: Auckland International Airport Limited provides airport facilities, supporting infrastructure, and aeronautical services in Auckland, New Zealand. The company operates through three segments: Aeronautical, Retail, and Property. The Aeronautical segment offers services that facilitate the movement of aircraft, passengers, and cargo, as well as utility services, which support the airport; and leases space for facilities, such as terminals. The Retail segment provides services to the retailers within the terminals; and car parking facilities for passengers, visitors, and airport staff. The Property segment leases cargo buildings, hangars, and stand-alone investment properties. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Manukau, New Zealand.

AIA.NZ.summary: Auckland International Airport Limited provides airport facilities, supporting infrastructure, and aeronautical services in Auckland, New Zealand. The company operates through three segments: Aeronautical, Retail, and Property. The Aeronautical segment offers services that facilitate the movement of aircraft, passengers, and cargo, as well as utility services, which support the airport; and leases space for facilities, such as terminals. The Retail segment provides services to the retailers within the terminals; and car parking facilities for passengers, visitors, and airport staff. The Property segment leases cargo buildings, hangars, and stand-alone investment properties. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Manukau, New Zealand.

AIR.NZ.summary: Air New Zealand Limited provides passenger and cargo transportation services on scheduled airlines primarily in New Zealand, Australia, the Pacific Islands, the United Kingdom, Europe, Asia, and the United States. The company also offers ground handling services; engineering and maintenance services, including aircraft and component maintenance, repair, and overhaul services; and aircraft leasing and financing services. It operates a fleet of 114 aircraft. The company was formerly known as Tasman Empire Airways Limited and changed its name to Air New Zealand Limited in April 1965. Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

AIZ.AX.summary: Air New Zealand Limited provides passenger and cargo transportation services on scheduled airlines primarily in New Zealand, Australia, the Pacific Islands, the United Kingdom, Europe, Asia, and the United States. The company also offers ground handling services; engineering and maintenance services, including aircraft and component maintenance, repair, and overhaul services; and aircraft leasing and financing services. It operates a fleet of 114 aircraft. The company was formerly known as Tasman Empire Airways Limited and changed its name to Air New Zealand Limited in April 1965. Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

The company also offers ground handling services; engineering and maintenance services, including aircraft and component maintenance, repair, and overhaul services; and aircraft leasing and financing services. It operates a fleet of 114 aircraft. The company was formerly known as Tasman Empire Airways Limited and changed its name to Air New Zealand Limited in April 1965. Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

The company also offers ground handling services; engineering and maintenance services, including aircraft and component maintenance, repair, and overhaul services; and aircraft leasing and financing services. It operates a fleet of 114 aircraft. The company was formerly known as Tasman Empire Airways Limited and changed its name to Air New Zealand Limited in April 1965. Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

The company operates through three segments: Aeronautical, Retail, and Property. The Aeronautical segment offers services that facilitate the movement of aircraft, passengers, and cargo, as well as utility services, which support the airport; and leases space for facilities, such as terminals. The Retail segment provides services to the retailers within the terminals; and car parking facilities for passengers, visitors, and airport staff. The Property segment leases cargo buildings, hangars, and stand-alone investment properties. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Manukau, New Zealand.

BZTA.F.summary: Auckland International Airport Limited provides airport facilities, supporting infrastructure, and aeronautical services in Auckland, New Zealand. The company operates through three segments: Aeronautical, Retail, and Property. The Aeronautical segment offers services that facilitate the movement of aircraft, passengers, and cargo, as well as utility services, which support the airport; and leases space for facilities, such as terminals. The Retail segment provides services to the retailers within the terminals; and car parking facilities for passengers, visitors, and airport staff. The Property segment leases cargo buildings, hangars, and stand-alone investment properties. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Manukau, New Zealand.

BZU.F.summary: Air New Zealand Limited provides passenger and cargo transportation services on scheduled airlines primarily in New Zealand, Australia, the Pacific Islands, the United Kingdom, Europe, Asia, and the United States. The company also offers ground handling services; engineering and maintenance services, including aircraft and component maintenance, repair, and overhaul services; and aircraft leasing and financing services. It operates a fleet of 114 aircraft. The company was formerly known as Tasman Empire Airways Limited and changed its name to Air New Zealand Limited in April 1965. Air New Zealand Limited was founded in 1940 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

FRE.NZ.summary: Freightways Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides express package and business mail services in New Zealand, Australia, and internationally. It operates through Express Package & Business Mail, Information Management, and Corporate and Other segments. The company provides network courier services under the New Zealand Couriers, Post Haste Couriers, Castle Parcels, and NOW Couriers brands; and point-to-point courier services under the SUB60, Kiwi Express, Stuck, Pass The Parcel, and Security Express brands. It also provides mail delivery services under the DX Mail brand; and mailhouse-print services and digital mail presentation platforms under the Dataprint brand. In addition, it provides a range of physical storage and information management, as well as digital information processing services, such as digitization, business process outsourcing, online back-up, and eDiscovery services, as well as document destruction and medical waste services primarily under the Archive Security, FileSaver, DataBank, Shred-X, and Med-X brands, as well as operates line-haul on the arterial roads under the Parceline Express name. Further, the company offers general and aviation engineering services; and aviation-related, IT infrastructure support, treasury management, and financing and property management services. The company offers its services through its network, as well as through international alliances. Freightways Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Penrose, New Zealand.

MFT.NZ.summary: Mainfreight Limited provides supply chain logistics solutions in New Zealand, Australia, the Americas, Asia, and Europe. It provides warehousing, domestic freight forwarding, and international air and ocean freight forwarding services. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

MHM.NZ.summary: MHM Automation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs and supplies automated systems and equipment for the food processing and logistics sectors in New Zealand and Australia. The company designs and fabricates stainless steel and associated equipment for industrial, dairy, wine, and food sectors; and sells and services specialized food cutting equipment. It also designs, manufactures, delivers, and services automated handling systems primarily for the food sector; and designs, manufactures, and installs chilling and freezing tunnels, and plate freezing systems to the food industry, as well as offers related services, spare parts, and support. In addition, the company develops and commercializes S-clave, a patented system for the sterilization of medical equipment in a non-porous container system. The company was formerly known as Mercer Group Limited. MHM Automation Limited was founded in 1884 and is based in Christchurch, New Zealand.

MMH.NZ.summary: Marsden Maritime Holdings Limited operates a deep water port facility in the Greater Marsden Point Area, New Zealand. The company operates through three segments: Port Related Operations, Property Holdings, and Marina and Commercial. It also provides 185 hectares of industrial land for lease; operates farmland at Marsden Point; and owns and operates the Marsden Cove marina complex, which consists of a 229 berth marina, commercial complex, and boatyard facility. The company was formerly known as Northland Port Corporation (NZ) Limited and changed its name to Marsden Maritime Holdings Limited in August 2014. Marsden Maritime Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Ruakaka, New Zealand.

MPG.NZ.summary: Metro Performance Glass Limited, together with its subsidiaries, supplies processed flat glass and related products for the residential and commercial building sectors in New Zealand and Australia. Its glass products include splashbacks, benchtops, and kitchen doors and mirrors; and bathroom mirrors, inline showers, two and three sided showers, bath end showers, bath screens, shower linings, and shower and screen hardware. The company also offers interior balustrades, stairs and floors, room dividers, mirrors, wall linings, doors, and furniture; and exterior balustrades, pool fences, wind breaks, glass canopies, glass features, outdoor furniture, and balustrade and pool fence hardware. In addition, it provides installation services. Metro Performance Glass Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

MPP.AX.summary: Metro Performance Glass Limited, together with its subsidiaries, supplies processed flat glass and related products for the residential and commercial building sectors in New Zealand and Australia. Its glass products include splashbacks, benchtops, and kitchen doors and mirrors; and bathroom mirrors, inline showers, two and three sided showers, bath end showers, bath screens, shower linings, and shower and screen hardware. The company also offers interior balustrades, stairs and floors, room dividers, mirrors, wall linings, doors, and furniture; and exterior balustrades, pool fences, wind breaks, glass canopies, glass features, outdoor furniture, and balustrade and pool fence hardware. In addition, it provides installation services. Metro Performance Glass Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

NPH.NZ.summary: Napier Port Holdings Limited provides various port services in the Napier Port. It offers marine, general cargo, container, port pack, and depot services. The company was founded in 1875 and is based in Napier, New Zealand. Napier Port Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Hawke's Bay Regional Investment Company Limited.

PGW.NZ.summary: PGG Wrightson Limited provides goods and services for agricultural sector in New Zealand. The company operates in two segments, Agency, and Retail & Water. It operates rural supplies stores that offer a range of products in various categories, such as fencing, agricultural chemicals, animal health, animal equipment and handling, clothing, fertilizer, home and garden, machinery, animal feed and nutrition, seeds, water and irrigation, horticulture, pet supplies, safety equipment, and dairy shed supplies. The company also provides agency services for the sale, purchase, and service of livestock through auction, private and on-farm sales, and online trading of livestock; irrigation and water services to farmers and horticulturists; and markets and exports wool products. In addition, it offers insurance products; fruit fed supplies; and rural supplies, as well as farm maintenance, soil and crop nutrition, and plant and soil testing. Further, the company provides real estate services, including rural, lifestyle, residential, and commercial properties. PGG Wrightson Limited was founded in 1841 and is based in Christchurch, New Zealand.

POT.NZ.short_name: Port of Tauranga Ltd Ordinary S
POT.NZ.summary: Port of Tauranga Limited, a port company, provides and manages port services and cargo handling facilities through the Port of Tauranga and MetroPort in New Zealand. It operates through three segments: Port Operations, Property Services, and Marshalling Services. The company also manages and maintains various port properties. In addition, it provides contracted terminal operations, stevedoring, marshalling, and scaling activities. Further, the company provides wharf facilities; and berthage, cranes, tugs, and pilot services, as well as offers services for the storage and transit of import and export cargo. The company was founded in 1873 and is based in Tauranga, New Zealand. Port of Tauranga Limited is a subsidiary of Quayside Securities Limited.

RAK.NZ.summary: Rakon Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells frequency control products for various applications in Asia, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company provides crystal resonators, tuning fork crystals, standard SMD crystals, crystal oscillators, voltage control crystal oscillators and clock oscillators, temperature compensated crystal oscillators, oven controlled crystal oscillators, and oven controlled surface acoustic wave (SAW) oscillators. It also offers a range of crystal filters, including bandpass filters, notch/stop band filters, linear phase or constant group delay filters, phase and/or amplitude matching filters, and monolithic filters; and frequency multipliers. The company's products are used in telecommunications, global positioning, and space and defense, and other markets. In addition, it is involved in the provision of financing and marketing support services; and research and development activities. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

SCT.NZ.summary: Scott Technology Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, sells, and services automated and robotic production lines, and processes for various industries in New Zealand and internationally. The company operates through Australasia Manufacturing, Americas Manufacturing, Europe Manufacturing and China Manufacturing segments. The company manufactures and sells automated laboratory sampling equipment for the mining industry; high temperature superconductor equipment; patented centrifuge technology for the honey and fish processing industries; automated guided vehicles under the Transbotics brand; band-saw machines under the BladeStop brand; and x-ray and sorting technology, as well as offers robot systems under the RobotWorx brand. It also offers industrial services and systems, which includes conventional and robot palletisers, depalletisers, pallet conveyors, case conveyors, and order preparation systems with stacker cranes and other material handling equipment, as well as software package Maestro+ under the Alvey brand name; and automated heavy gauge precision metal stamping equipment under the DC Ross brand. In addition, the company provides cryogen-free electromagnetic products, such as solenoids, current leads, coils, magnets, current systems, and magnetic resonance systems under the HTS-110 brand name; and sample preparation equipment under the ROCKLABS brand. It serves appliances, materials handling and logistics, meat processing, mining, and other industrial automation industries. Scott Technology Limited was founded in 1913 and is based in Dunedin, New Zealand.

SKL.NZ.summary: Skellerup Holdings Limited manufactures, markets, and distributes technical polymer and elastomer products for various specialist industrial and agricultural applications. It operates through Agri and Industrial segments. The company offers food grade dairy rubberware, including liners and tubing products, and rubber footwear for agricultural applications; milk filters; milk liners, tubing, and accessories; feeding teats; dairy vacuum pumps; and dairy hygiene and livestock health management products, as well as mastitis prevention and mastitis detection equipment. It also provides sealing and waterproofing products for roofing, plumbing, and civil/underground applications; pipe seals, diaphragms, washers, gaskets, customized rubber moldings, check valves, O rings, disks, and other components for use in automotive, industrial, mining pipe, valve, and medical industries; high precision rubber and plastic components for the automotive, flow control, appliance, and industrial markets; and fabric reinforced diaphragms, and rubber metal seat valves and injector components. In addition, the company offers EVA, PE, and various blended foams for marine, sports, leisure, orthotic, and construction applications; foam and soft material products; and live wall systems for installation in new and existing chutes. It operates primarily in New Zealand, Australia, North America, the United Kingdom, Ireland, rest of Europe, Asia, and internationally. Skellerup Holdings Limited was founded in 1910 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

SPN.NZ.summary: South Port New Zealand Limited provides and manages port and warehousing services in New Zealand. It operates the Port of Bluff in the province of Southland. The company offers pilotage, towage, berthage, and full marine services to international and coastal vessels, including southern fishing fleet. It also provides full container, break bulk, and bulk cargo services for the import of alumina, petroleum products, fertilizers, acids, stock foods, and cement products; and the export of aluminum, timber, logs, dairy, meat by-products, fishes, and woodchips. In addition, the company offers container tracking services; dry warehousing services for a range of industries, including dairy, forestry, stock feed, and general cargo; cold stores for chilled and frozen products; and open storage facilities for logs, containers, woodchips, sawn timber, steel, and others. Further, it handles project cargo, such as transformer weighing, wind farm material, hydroelectric power station tail race equipment, mining equipment, and tanks for tallow storage, as well as a range of machinery, including pleasure and fishing vessels. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Bluff, New Zealand.

STG.AX.summary: Straker Translations Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of translation services in Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and North America. The company operates AI-POWERED RAY, a suite of customizable AI and automation translation tools that creates a first draft translation and matching the customer's content with one or more of the approximately 10,000 crowd-sourced human freelance translators for refinement. It offers corporate and business translation services, such as e-commerce translation, financial translation, human resources translation, legal document translation, marketing content translation, medical document translation, technical document translation, Website translation, audio and video translation, and document translation services, as well as desktop publishing services. The company also provides language translation services; machine translation services; immigration, legal, and ECFMG translation services; birth, death, and marriage certificates translation services; and passports, visa, medical, personal and private docs, drivers license, police and legal documents, academic records and transcripts, insurance, and other document translation services, as well as translation automation solutions comprising API translation solutions. Its platform supports African, Asian, Eastern European, European, Indian, Middle Eastern, and other languages. Straker Translations Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

TLL.NZ.summary: TIL Logistics Group Limited operates as a freight and logistics company in New Zealand. It operates through International, Specialist, Freighting, Warehousing & Logistics, and Bulk Liquids segments. The company offers international freight forwarding services for the oil and gas industry; shipping agency services; transport and lifting solutions for oversized and large items, as well as advisory services; freight transport; warehousing and supply chain solutions; and delivery of various bulk liquid goods. It also provides heavy haulage, container transport, shipping, storage and distribution, and household removals and storage services. In addition, the company offers custom clearance work, port services, ship husbandry, crew matters, tank cleaning, and various services for importers/exporters, as well as asset leasing services. It owns and operates a fleet of approximately 2,300 trucks, trailers, forklifts, and light vehicles, as well as petroleum product dangerous goods road tanker fleets under the Pacific Fuel Haul brand name. The company is headquartered in New Plymouth, New Zealand.

WDT.NZ.summary: Wellington Drive Technologies Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, and sells energy saving and electronically commutated (EC) motors, controllers, and fans; and develops Internet of Things solutions and software worldwide. It offers ECR refrigeration fan motors, refrigeration fan assemblies, fractional horsepower ventilation fan motors, and AirMoVent shaded pole Q-motors; refrigeration control solutions, including Connect SCS range of products that are a family of intelligent electronic thermostats and energy management devices for commercial refrigeration systems; and SCS Connect System, a fleet management system for point of sale refrigeration equipment. The company also provides proximity marketing solutions comprising iPX Platform that connects customer's digital marketing efforts to SCS beacons or other proximity devices; Mobile Coupon Factory, which operates as an online agency that facilitates in the design, development, and deployment of integrated mobile marketing solutions; ScreenSmarts, which integrates with digital media screens to silently detect the presence of customers and interrupt normal sign content programming to display personalized contextual offers or information. Its products are used in supermarket and supermarket refrigeration, beverage merchandising, and food service applications. The company was formerly known as Cadac Limited and changed its name to Wellington Drive Technologies Limited in September 1996. Wellington Drive Technologies Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.
